body:
TLDR: We need python@2 with py-torch and py-torchvision.  The last working versions are py-torch@1.4.1 and py-torchvision@0.5.1.  This adds the missing version to py-torchvision.

See #20810 for why we can't build py-torch@1.4.0 with python@2

See #20801 for the original messages that caused this to be needed.
title: py-torchvision@0.5.0 depends on py-torch@1.4.1
